summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5944 for the improvement of Chio Avenue, from West Hudson Street to East Marginal Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78948, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
